thread.title: MOVES-Insight Investment appoints John Rushen as EMEA institutional head
thread.title_full: MOVES-Insight Investment appoints John Rushen as EMEA institutional head | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MOVES-Insight Investment appoints John Rushen as EMEA institutional head
text:
July 10 Asset manager Insight Investment appointed John Rushen as head of institutional for EMEA, based in London.
Rushen joins the company in a newly created role, and will report to Philip Anker, global head of distribution.
He joins Insight, part of the Bank of New York Mellon , from Aon Hewitt where he served as head of EMEA investment services. (Reporting by Natalie Grover)
